mangaName: Shin no Nakama janai to Yuusha no Party wo Oidasareta node, Henkyou de Slow Life suru Koto ni shimashita
alternativeNames:
I Was Kicked out of the Hero’s Party Because I Wasn’t a True Companion so I Decided to Have a Slow Life at the Frontier
Shin no Nakama janai to Yuusha no Party wo Oidasareta node, Henkyou de Slow Life suru Koto ni shimashita
Slow Life Frontier
真の仲間じゃないと勇者のパーティーを追い出されたので、辺境でスローライフすることにしました
author: Zappon
genres: Accion, Aventura, Comedia, Fantasia, Romance, Recuentos de Vida
